sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"校长"之意。
means: headmaster ： 在英国指对中小学校长的一般称呼，尤指私立学校的校长。
principal ： 在英国可指大学校长、院长以及中小学校长，但在美国仅指中小学校长。
president ： 在美国专指大学的校长，在英国指学院院长。

sentence.Network_en: The President's speeches are regularly reproduced verbatim in the state-run newspapers.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统的讲话通常会被一字不差地刊登在国有报纸上。

sentence.Network_en: The president beat his breast and called that deal a mistake.
sentence.Network_cn: 总裁捶胸顿足，称那是个错误的交易。

sentence.Network_en: The President's unescorted vehicle was ambushed just outside the capital.
sentence.Network_cn: 刚出首都，总统无人护卫的汽车就遭到了伏击。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin praesident- 'sitting before' (see preside)

encyclopedia.content: 英文单词，总统、国家主席、执政官的意思；台湾集团企业“统一企业”的英文名称；另有同名电影、电视剧。基本信息为电视剧《president》，讲述崔秀钟饰演的男主人公从一名民权运动家成长为总统的故事，向人们揭示围绕政治竞选的种种明争暗斗。崔秀钟的妻子河熙拉也出演该剧，与崔秀钟在电视剧中饰演夫妻，而Super Junior成员晟敏则饰演崔秀钟与河熙拉的儿子。

entry.def: The president of a country that has no king or queen is the person who is the head of state of that country.

example.ex: The White House says the president would veto the bill.
example.tran: 白宫称总统将否决这项议案。

entry.tran: 院长；校长；会长；总裁；董事长
entry.def: The president of an organization is the person who has the highest position in it.

example.ex: Research and marketing operations will be Mr. Furlaud's job as president of the new company.
example.tran: 作为新公司的总裁，弗劳德先生将负责调研和市场运作。

example.ex: ...Alexandre de Merode, the president of the medical commission.
example.tran: 药物委员会主席亚历山大·德梅罗德

means.word_mean: 1. an executive officer of a firm or corporation
2. the chief executive of a republic
3. the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization;
4. the head administrative officer of a college or university

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am glad the president came to our area.

auth_sentence.content: The former president turned out to be a coward.

auth_sentence.content: Can you still go from burger flipper to president?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can you still go from burger flipper to president?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can you still go from burger flipper to president?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得考虑的, 相当可观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider[v.考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作]+able能……的→adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的
consider考虑+ate……的→考虑到的
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
in进入+side边→adj.&n.&adv.里面[的,地],内部[的,地]
out外面+side边→adj.&n.&adv.外面[的,地],外部[的,地]
considerable[adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的]+ly表副词→considerably相当地
preside[v.[at,over]主持]+ent人→主持[的人]
preside主持+ium地方或团体→n.主席团
reside[v.居住,驻扎;属于]+nce→n.住处,住宅
considerate[adj.考虑周到的,体谅的]+ion表名词→consideration体谅, 考虑
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
side旁边+way路→n.小路, 小巷,人行道
sub下+side坐→坐下去→平息
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,通常表示"……人",也可以表示其他具体物.; 3. 表名词,"……药剂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: antecede先行+ent……的→adj.先行的;以前的
confide倾诉,信赖+ent……的→confident
excel优胜,超越+ent……的→excellent卓越的,极好的
frequ+ent……的→adj.时常发生的,频繁的
indigen本地人+ent……的→indigent
insist坚持+ent……的→adj.坚持的;逼人注意的
lat=last持续+ent……的→latent
obey服从+di+ent……的→obedient→服从的
preval=prevail流行+ent……的→adj.流行的,普遍的
pung=punct针+ent……的→尖的→尖锐的
sent感觉+i+ent……的→adj.有知觉的,知悉的
sil+ent……的→adj.寂静的,沉默的,无声的
strid+ent……的→adj.刺耳的;尖锐的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+i+ent……的→adj.短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
urg+ent……的→adj.急迫的,紧急的
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的
absorb吸收,吸引+ent……药剂→吸收剂
deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
solv溶解+ent……药剂→溶剂
correspond通信+ent……人→n.记者,通讯员;通信者
preside主持+ent……人→主持[的人]
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [大中学校的]学生;研究者,学者
stems_affixes.word_buile: study学习+ent……人→student学生
absorb吸收,吸引+ent……药剂→吸收剂
deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
re再+ag做+ent……药剂→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂
solv溶解+ent……药剂→溶剂

Sentence.sentence: If you think so, you're not alone, because energy independence has been the dream of American president for decades, and never more so than in the past few years, when the most recent oil price shock has been partly responsible for kicking off the great recession.
For example, Arne Sorenson, the president of Marriott hotels, likens the crisis to the downturn that hit his business after September 11th, 2001.
We can't announce other people's news," said Greg Joswiak, vice president of iPod and iPhone marketing at Apple.

The University of Maryland at College Park is proceeding cautiously, giving the iPhone or iPod Touch to 150 students, said Jeffrey Huskamp, vice president and chief information officer at the university
Comparing 1929 with 2007-09, Christina Romer, the head of President Obama's Council of Economic Advisers, finds the initial blow to confidence far greater now than then.

sentences.en: The President fastened on the idea at once.
sentences.cn: 总统立即拿定了这个主意。

means.word_mean: (大学)校长; 会长; 董事长; 总裁; （机构、俱乐部、学院等的）负责人, 院长, 主席

sentences.en: They approached the president with the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他们找校长提出这一意见。

sentences.en: He is the Vice President (VP) of our Board Meeting
sentences.cn: 他是我们董事会的副主席

jushi.english: They were plotting how they would assassinate the president.
jushi.chinese: 他们正秘密策划如何暗杀总统。

jushi.english: The president's veto of the bill dashed the hopes of many mayors.
jushi.chinese: 总统对议案的否决使许多市长的希望落空。

jushi.english: The president is believed to be seriously ill.
